text: phir jab ve usake paas upasthit hue to kaha, "ai azeez! hamen aur hamaare gharavaalon ko bahut takaleef pahunchee hain aur ham kuchh tuchchh-see poonjee lekar aae hai, kintu aap hamen pooree-pooree maap pradaan karen. aur hamen daan den. nishchay hee daan karanevaalon ko badala allaah deta hai.
